description: Razor provisioning system puppet installation module

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The broker plugin.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
properties.name: plugin

properties.doc: The broker servers.
properties.name: servers

properties.doc: The version of the broker to use
properties.name: version

properties.doc: The broker UUID. This property is not expected to be speciified by the user.
properties.name: uuid

parameters.doc: The name of the broker.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: name

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The image version. The value is automatically detected for mk and esx.  Values can match `/[A-Za-z0-9]/`.
properties.name: version

properties.doc: The image type, currently support mk, os, esxi  Valid values are `mk`, `os`, `esxi`.
properties.name: type

properties.doc: The image UUID. This property is not expected to be specified by the user.
properties.name: uuid

parameters.doc: The name of the operating system.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc: The image source, can be either local absolute path or remote http(s) source.
parameters.name: source

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The model description.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
properties.name: description

properties.doc: The model template  Values can match `/\w+/`.
properties.name: template

properties.doc: The model UUID. This property is not expected to be speciified by the user.
properties.name: uuid

properties.doc: The model deployment image name.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
properties.name: image

parameters.doc: The name of the razor model.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: name

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: Valid values are `true`, `false`.
properties.name: enabled

properties.doc: The policy description.
properties.name: description

properties.doc: The policy tags.
properties.name: tags

properties.doc: The policy broker name.
properties.name: broker

properties.doc: The policy maximum deployment instances.
properties.name: maximum

properties.doc: The policy deployment model.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
properties.name: model

properties.doc: The policy priority.
properties.name: priority

properties.doc: The policy UUID. This property is not expected to be speciified by the user.
properties.name: uuid

parameters.doc: The name of the policy.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc: The policy template name.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: template

properties.doc: The basic property that the resource should be in.  Valid values are `present`, `absent`.
properties.name: ensure

properties.doc: The razor tag. (do not use puppet metaparameter tag)  Values can match `/[A-Za-z0-9]/`.
properties.name: tag_label

properties.doc: The tag_matcher rules.
properties.name: tag_matcher

properties.doc: The tag UUID. This property is not expected to be specified by the user.
properties.name: uuid

parameters.doc: The name of the operating system.  Values can match `/\w+/`.
parameters.name: name

author: Puppet Labs
name: puppetlabs-razor
